summary: Encapsulates a lower‑triangular (causal) mask that can be combined with an additive tensor bias, exposing a tensor‑like object usable directly in PyTorch operations.
business_intent: Enable models that require causal masking—such as language models or time‑series predictors—to apply the mask together with a configurable bias efficiently, simplifying attention‑mask handling in deep‑learning pipelines.
